game.name: Eternal Return
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input
game.shortDescription: 이터널 리턴은 쿼터뷰로 진행되는 무료 배틀로얄 게임입니다. 제작, 사냥, 전투 그리고 멋진 캐릭터들을 경험해보시고 최후의 생존을 위한 전략적인 판단, 화려한 전투 플레이로 영원히 반복되는 실험에서 최후의 생존자가 되십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Eternal Return is a free-to-play, 2.5D perspective Battle Royale game. Search, Craft, Hunt, and Fight using a variety of characters. Plan your strategy and become the last survivor on this eternal experiment.

reviewHighlights.text: Eternal Return community. I know you won't read this but have an special message to spread around to the community, Merry christmas and have an happy...
Came back to check out the collab after a year or so of not playing. The skins being paid is w/e, but at least having the lobby music would have been...
